title: New: Chantelle Paredes – 2 Thousand
body:
The California boy/girl duo of **Chantelle Paredes** returns with another shimmering sound and their first track of the year.

**2 Thousand** is an alluring piano driven and string whispering pop fantasia, a fragile ambient pop number that feels like a more down to earth **Lana Del Rey,** starring right between your eyes and forcing shivers down your spine with that one, otherworldly beautiful glare…
